code: import axios from'axios';import{USER_UPDATED_SUCCESS,USER_ADDED_REVIEW_SUCCESS,USER_ADDED_REVIEW_FAILURE}from"../utils/constants/actions-types";import{API_BASE_URL}from"../utils/constants/url";export const updateUserInfo=(userData,history)=>async dispatch=>{axios({method:"PUT",url:API_BASE_URL+"/user/edit",data:userData,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":localStorage.getItem("token")}});dispatch({type:USER_UPDATED_SUCCESS});history.push("/account");};export const addReviewToPerfume=data=>async dispatch=>{try{await axios.post(API_BASE_URL+"/user/review",data);dispatch({type:USER_ADDED_REVIEW_SUCCESS});window.location.reload();}catch(error){dispatch({type:USER_ADDED_REVIEW_FAILURE,payload:error.response.data});}};
